data.text:
This makes complete sense. Every szn is based on a variety of factors, & most of the time, if the problem isn't visibly the coach, it's not worth getting rid of someone w/out a better person already lined up.

Caveat: repetition of the same failures is a valid reason for firing. https://t.co/AiaZuQIlIH
